api/BradleyLeach_BooseApp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BradleyLeach_BooseApp Assembly BradleyLeach_BooseApp.dll This class is responsible for drawing on the canvas. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) Constructor to create a canvas of specified size. public AppCanvas(int xSize, int ySize) Parameters xSize int ySize int Fields backgroundColour Solid background colour for the canvas. protected readonly Color backgroundColour Field Value Color Properties PenColour Expression to get and set the current pen colour. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Expression to get and set the current drawing X position. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Expression to get and set the current drawing Y position. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draw a circle centered at cursor position with specified radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int Radius of circle being drawn filled bool Specifies if circle drawn should be filled NOT IMPLEMENTED YEY Clear() Reset canvas to background colour. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draw line from current cursor position to x,y position. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int X position to draw to y int Y position to draw to MoveTo(int, int) move drawing cursor to x,y position. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int xPosition to move to y int y Position to move to Rect(int, int, bool) Draw a rectangle at cursor position of width and height. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int Width of rectangle height int Height of rectangle filled bool fills area of rectangle Reset() Reset drawing cursor to 0,0 and reset pen to default. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Set output display size. public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int Width of output display height int Height of output display SetColour(int, int, int) Set pen colour using RGB values. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int red RGB pen component green int green RGB pen component blue int blue RGB pen component Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle in the bounding rectangle. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int Width of bounding rectangle height int Height of bounding rectangle WriteText(string) Writes text to the canvas at the current position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string Text to write to the canvas getBitmap() public object getBitmap() Returns object

object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks This form serves as the entry point for the application, managing the canvas rendering, command handling, program storage, and parsing functionality. It includes event handlers for user interactions, such as painting the canvas and executing commands via the "Run" button. The form also displays runtime errors to the user when necessary. Constructors Form1() Initializes a new instance of the Form1 class. public Form1() Remarks This constructor sets up the form by initializing its components, populating the input box with application information, and preparing the necessary objects for canvas rendering, command handling, program storage, and parsing. Methods Dispose(bool) Clean up any resources being used. protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) Parameters disposing bool true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

api/BradleyLeach_BooseApp.html.title: Namespace BradleyLeach_BooseApp | BooseApp
api/BradleyLeach_BooseApp.html.summary: Namespace BradleyLeach_BooseApp Classes AppCanvas This class is responsible for drawing on the canvas. AppCircle Command class to draw circle centered at the current position with specified radius. AppCommandFactory Factory class to create BOOSE application specific commands. AppDrawTo Command class to draw a line from the current position to a specified position. AppMoveTo Command class to move the current drawing position to a specified position. AppNoCommand Blank BOOSE command that does nothing. Used for maintaining correct line numbering in case of commands with invlaid syntax. AppParser Parser class to interpret BOOSE commands for the application. AppPenColour Command class to change the current pen colour to specified RGB values. AppRect Command class to draw a rectangle of specified width and height from the current position. AppStoredProgram Stored program responsible for storing commands and executing them, extends base StoredProgram class. Form1 Represents the main form of the application, providing the user interface for rendering a canvas, parsing and executing commands, and displaying runtime results or errors.
